headline.main: Fowler Homers as Cubs Beat White Sox 9-2
headline.print_headline: Fowler Homers as Cubs Beat White Sox 9-2

docs.snippet: Dexter Fowler hit his second spring homer and Jason Hammel pitched four scoreless innings, leading a split-squad of Chicago Cubs to a 9-2 victory over the Chicago White Sox on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dexter Fowler hit his second spring homer and Jason Hammel pitched four scoreless innings, leading a split-squad of Chicago Cubs to a 9-2 victory over the Chicago White Sox on Saturday.

headline.main: Braehmer Beats Gutknecht on Points Again to Retain WBA Belt
headline.print_headline: Braehmer Beats Gutknecht on Points Again to Retain WBA Belt

docs.snippet: Juergen Braehmer defeated fellow German Eduard Gutknecht by unanimous decision for the second time to retain his WBA light heavyweight title on Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Juergen Braehmer defeated fellow German Eduard Gutknecht by unanimous decision for the second time to retain his WBA light heavyweight title on Saturday night.

headline.main: Online Harassment Must Be Met Head-On: Tech Summit Panel
headline.print_headline: Online Harassment Must Be Met Head-On: Tech Summit Panel

docs.snippet: Online harassment and sexism is demeaning women and can no longer be brushed aside as an ugly side of social media and the gaming industry if they are to thrive, panelists on Saturday said at the South By Southwest (SXSW) tech meeting in Austin....
docs.lead_paragraph: Online harassment and sexism is demeaning women and can no longer be brushed aside as an ugly side of social media and the gaming industry if they are to thrive, panelists on Saturday said at the South By Southwest (SXSW) tech meeting in Austin.

headline.main: Haas Earns One-Shot Lead After Three Rounds at Valspar
headline.print_headline: Haas Earns One-Shot Lead After Three Rounds at Valspar

docs.snippet: Bill Haas looked at ease on the greens at the Valspar Championship in Florida on Saturday after a putting tip from Rickie Fowler helped him move into a one-stroke lead over Graham DeLaet after the third round....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Haas looked at ease on the greens at the Valspar Championship in Florida on Saturday after a putting tip from Rickie Fowler helped him move into a one-stroke lead over Graham DeLaet after the third round.

headline.main: How the Governor Responded to Flint

headline.main: Attacking Poverty to Foster Creativity in Entrepreneurs

docs.snippet: Noticing a cluster of vendors selling identical snacks, a scholar finds a reason for the lack of innovation....
docs.abstract: Phyllis Korkki Applied Science column looks at soon-to-be published study by Fulbright scholar and management expert Laura Doering, which explains why poor entrepreneurs struggle to turn their creative ideas into profitable businesses.
docs.lead_paragraph: Noticing a cluster of vendors selling identical snacks, a scholar finds a reason for the lack of innovation.

headline.main: Obama to Visit London in Bid to Keep UK in the EU: Report
headline.print_headline: Obama to Visit London in Bid to Keep UK in the EU: Report

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama will come to London in April and urge British voters to back continued membership of the European Union, The Independent on Sunday newspaper reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama will come to London in April and urge British voters to back continued membership of the European Union, The Independent on Sunday newspaper reported.
